	The approximate aggregate market value of voting common shares held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which common shares were last sold as of June 30, 2015 was $165,569,534. Shares held by each executive officer and director and by each person who beneficially owns more than 5% of the outstanding common shares have been excluded in that such persons may under certain circumstances be deemed to be affiliates. This determination of affiliate status is not necessarily a conclusive determination for other purposes.

<EFX_PART_I>
<A NAME="FIS_PART_I"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	PART I
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Statements made in this Form 10-K that are not historical facts may constitute forward-looking statements that are subject to risks and uncertainties that could cause actual results to differ materially from those discussed. Words such as &#8220;expects,&#8221; &#8220;may,&#8221; &#8220;will,&#8221; &#8220;anticipates,&#8221; &#8220;intends,&#8221; &#8220;plans,&#8221; &#8220;believes,&#8221; &#8220;seeks,&#8221; &#8220;estimates,&#8221; and similar expressions identify forward-looking statements. See &#8220;Risk Factors.&#8221;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	References to &#8220;we&#8221; and &#8220;our&#8221; means BioTime, Inc. and its subsidiaries unless the context otherwise indicates.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The description or discussion, in this Form 10-K, of any contract or agreement is a summary only and is qualified in all respects by reference to the full text of the applicable contract or agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	INDUSTRY AND MARKET DATA
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Annual Report on Form 10-K contains market data and industry forecasts that were obtained from industry publications, third party market research and publicly available information. These publications generally state that the information contained therein has been obtained from sources believed to be reliable. While we believe that the information from these publications is reliable, we have not independently verified such information.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Annual Report on Form 10-K also contains estimates and other statistical data made by independent parties and by us relating to market size and growth and other data about our industry. We obtained the industry and market data in this Report from our own research as well as from industry and general publications, surveys and studies conducted by third parties, some of which may not be publicly available. Such data involves a number of assumptions and limitations and contains projections and estimates of the future performance of the industries in which we operate that are subject to a high degree of uncertainty. We caution you not to give undue weight to such projections, assumptions and estimates.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<EFX_BUSINESS>
<A NAME="FIS_BUSINESS"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="6A6CDE0887C74BD2AF112B47DB91BB06" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<A NAME="FORM10K_HTM_ITEM1_">
<!--ANCHOR-->
</A>
	Item 1.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Business
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Overview
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	BioTime, Inc. is a clinical-stage biotechnology company focused on developing and commercializing novel therapies developed from two of our core technology platforms. We believe we have the world&#8217;s premier collection of pluripotent stem cell assets and the best cell delivery platform. The foundation of our core therapeutic technology platform is pluripotent stem cells that are capable of becoming any of the cell types in the human body. Cell types derived from pluripotent stem cells have potential application in many areas of medicine with large unmet patient needs, including various age-related degenerative diseases and degenerative conditions for which there presently are no cures. Unlike pharmaceuticals which almost always require a molecular target, therapeutic strategies based on the use of cell types derived from pluripotent stem cells are generally aimed at regenerating or replacing affected cells and tissues, and therefore may have broader applicability than pharmaceutical products. Our pluripotent stem cell technology is complemented by our
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	HyStem
</FONT>
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER">
	&#174;
</SUP>
	technology for the delivery and engraftment of cells, whether derived from pluripotent stem cells or the patient&#8217;s own somatic or adult stem cells, at the desired location.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In order to efficiently advance product candidates through the clinical trial process, we have historically created operating subsidiaries for each program and product line. Management believes this approach has fostered efficient use of resources and reduced shareholder dilution as compared to strategies commonly deployed by the biotechnology industry, as the various programs and product lines have advanced through basic research and animal studies. As a result, we have been able to develop multiple clinical-stage products rather than being dependent on a single product program. We and some of our subsidiaries have also received substantial amounts of non-dilutive financial support from government and nonprofit organizations that are seeking, based on rigorous scientific review processes, to identify and accelerate the development of potential breakthroughs in the treatment of various major diseases.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	We and our subsidiaries now have four therapeutic product candidates in human clinical trials (See &#8220;Products and Product Candidates&#8221; elsewhere in this Report).
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	4
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage5"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ID="DSPFPAGEHEADER">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
<A HREF="#FORM10K_HTM_TABLEOFCONTENTS">
	Table of Content
</A>
</DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="521D104A51CA408A96D782E548B45786" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Renevia
</FONT>
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;COLOR: #000000">
	&#174;
</SUP>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	, a potential treatment for HIV related facial lipoatrophy,
</FONT>
	is currently in
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	a pivotal clinical trial in Europe to assess its efficacy in restoring normal skin contours in patients whose subcutaneous fat, or adipose tissue, has been lost due to antiviral drug treatment for HIV.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Renevia
</FONT>
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;COLOR: #000000">
	&#174;
</SUP>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	consists of our cell-transplantation delivery matrix (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	HyStem
</FONT>
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;COLOR: #000000">
	&#174;
</SUP>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	) combined with the patient&#8217;s own adipose cells. Over time, we may discover that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Renevia
</FONT>
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;COLOR: #000000">
	&#174;
</SUP>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	has much broader applications beyond its use in patients with HIV.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	AST-VAC1, a cancer immunotherapy with promising Phase II clinical trial data in acute myeloid leukemia (&#8220;AML&#8221;). Asterias currently plans to submit a request for a Special Protocol Assessment (SPA) to the FDA to confirm the primary endpoint and other design elements of this pivotal Phase 3 trial;
</DIV>
</TD>

</FONT>
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER">
	&#174;
</SUP>
	, a potential therapy derived from pluripotent stem cells for the treatment of the dry form of age-related macular degeneration (&#8220;AMD&#8221;) is currently in a Phase I/IIa clinical trial; and
</DIV>

</TABLE>

<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="5110FDE92C514DC28E376A02884C8770" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	AST-OPC1, a potential therapy derived from pluripotent stem cells, is currently in a Phase I/II clinical trial for spinal cord injuries.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In addition, our collaborator Cancer Research UK is preparing to initiate a Phase I/II clinical trial of AST-VAC2 in non-small cell lung cancer, or NSCLC, representing a second generation, allogeneic approach to cancer immunotherapy.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Other therapies derived from pluripotent stem cells that are in pre-clinical development include an innovative bone grafting therapy and potential treatments for a variety of cardiovascular and related ischemic disorders.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In addition to the development of therapeutics that address large market opportunities, BioTime&#8217;s research and other activities have resulted, over time,&#160;in the creation of subsidiaries that address other, non-therapeutic market opportunities.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Strategy
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	We are transitioning BioTime into a clinical and commercial-ready company. Our near-term focus is to achieve three primary objectives:
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="86F4402CA3CC4712A19809A207B2AE3A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	1)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	Advancing key product development programs through clinical trials;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="CECBF298BD3B4F8AA5EFB0FE96CAD3CB" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">

	Simplifying the company structure to focus resources on the development of promising cell therapies that address large market opportunities; and
</TD>
</TR>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="00D3D8C406DC431683A8CD520658F2B9" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	To foster these goals, during 2015, we implemented a Co-CEO leadership team. Adi Mohanty, previously our Chief Operating Officer, was appointed Co-Chief Executive Officer and leads human clinical development, product commercialization, corporate and administrative functions. Dr. Michael D. West, our Co-Chief Executive Officer, who is one of the world&#8217;s foremost experts on therapies derived from stem cells, leads science, product discovery, and preclinical product development programs.

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Key Accomplishments in 2015
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	We achieved numerous strategic accomplishments during 2015.&#160;We advanced several key development programs as we initiated patient recruitment and dosing in multiple clinical trials. We&#160;reported positive clinical and preclinical data at four annual scientific meetings that showed the promise of our product candidates AST-VAC1 and
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	OpRegen
</FONT>
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER">
	&#174;
</SUP>
	.&#160;We entered into collaborations designed to advance development programs.&#160;We continued unlocking the value of our subsidiaries with the distribution of OncoCyte Corporation ("OncoCyte") common stock to BioTime shareholders. OncoCyte common stock is now traded on the NYSE MKT under the symbol "OCX".
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Clinical Progress
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="671EC68B2125417F8D4A3DF28DD424CC" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 17PX">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 31PX; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8226;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The first patients were successfully treated in BioTime&#8217;s ongoing pivotal clinical trial in Europe assessing the efficacy of
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Renevia
</FONT>
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER">
	&#174;
</SUP>
	for the treatment of HIV-associated lipoatrophy. We have opened additional clinical sites and expect to have the clinical trial fully enrolled in 2016.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="EFF84111C1214B6281539F61525D8543" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 17PX">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 31PX; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8226;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Our subsidiary Asterias Biotherapeutics, Inc. (&#8220;Asterias&#8221;) announced positive long-term follow-up data from a Phase II clinical trial of AST-VAC1 in patients with acute myeloid leukemia (AML) that showed more than 50% of those who received AST-VAC1 had prolonged relapse-free survival. Asterias discussed the clinical data during an oral presentation at the 2015 American Society of Clinical Oncology (ASCO) Annual Meeting.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="498CFF7DFA8E4569A07FC741A154676A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 17PX">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 31PX; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8226;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Our subsidiary, Cell Cure Neurosciences, Ltd. (&#8220;Cell Cure Neurosciences&#8221;), began enrolling patients at Hadassah University Medical Center in Jerusalem, Israel, in a Phase I/IIa dose-escalation clinical trial evaluating the safety and efficacy of pluripotent stem cell-derived
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	OpRegen
</FONT>
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER">
	&#174;
</SUP>
	for geographic atrophy, the severe stage of the dry form of AMD. Cell Cure Neurosciences received Fast Track designation from the FDA for
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	OpRegen
</FONT>
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER">
	&#174;
</SUP>
	for the treatment of dry-AMD.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="FC2609F3F9DF4F909BB6A0E36F8D8370" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 17PX">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 31PX; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8226;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Asterias initiated patient enrollment and dosing in the SCiStar Phase I/IIa clinical trial of AST-OPC1 (oligodendrocyte progenitor cells) in patients with complete cervical spinal cord injury. Subsequently, Asterias concluded recruitment of the initial safety cohort, in which three patients were administered a low dose of 2 million AST-OPC1 cells. Following review of the 30-day post-injection safety data from the initial cohort, the Data Monitoring Committee, an independent group of experts who monitor patient safety and treatment efficacy data while a clinical trial is ongoing, recommended dose escalation of AST-OPC1 to the second cohort, and patient recruitment for the second cohort has commenced.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="072EFD847D784DE38BE974C8C81EA9C2" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13.5PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 22.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#8226;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	In a prospective clinical validation study, proprietary tests developed by our subsidiary OncoCyte for the non-invasive diagnosis of bladder cancer demonstrated a high level of sensitivity and specificity in the detection of urothelial carcinoma, the most common type of bladder cancer. This data was presented at the American Association for Cancer Research 2015 Annual Meeting.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="CA2675C5432C4828B4405C1D277E6E25" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13.5PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 22.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#8226;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	At the American Thoracic Society International Conference, OncoCyte&#8217;s collaborators at the Wistar Institute of Anatomy and Biology presented positive clinical interim results demonstrating the high level of observed sensitivity and specificity in the assayed samples of OncoCyte&#8217;s blood-based diagnostic test designed to aid physicians in the early detection of lung cancer.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>

</DIV>

	We&#160;are incorporated in the State of California. Our common shares trade on the NYSE MKT and the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange (&#8220;TASE&#8221;) under the symbol &#8220;BTX.&#8221; Our principal executive offices are located at 1010 Atlantic Avenue, Suite 102, Alameda, CA 94501, and our phone number at that address is (510) 521-3390. Our website address is www.biotimeinc.com. The information on, or that can be accessed through our website is not part of this Report. We also make available, free of charge through our website, our most recent annual report on Form 10-K, quarterly reports on Form 10-Q, current reports on Form 8-K, and any amendments to those reports, as soon as reasonably practicable after the reports are electronically filed with or furnished to the Securities and Exchange Commission (the &#8220;SEC&#8221;).

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Cell-based Products &amp; Product Candidates

<DIV STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	Our cell-based products and product candidates are based on one of two technologies:
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	HyStem

</SUP>
	cell delivery technology and pluripotent stem cells.
